The configuration options provide flexibility in adapting to diverse network environments and security requirements.

TITLE: Using AWS SDK for Go to List DynamoDB Tables
DESCRIPTION: Go code demonstrating how to use the AWS SDK to create a DynamoDB client, list tables, and handle errors. It includes loading configuration, creating a service client, and making an API request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
package main

import (
    "context"
    "fmt"
    "log"

    "github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws"
    "github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/config"
    "github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/service/dynamodb"
)

func main() {
    // Using the SDK's default configuration, load additional config
    // and credentials values from the environment variables, shared
    // credentials, and shared configuration files
    cfg, err := config.LoadDefaultConfig(context.TODO(), config.WithRegion("us-west-2"))
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatalf("unable to load SDK config, %v", err)
    }

    // Using the Config value, create the DynamoDB client
    svc := dynamodb.NewFromConfig(cfg)

    // Build the request with its input parameters
    resp, err := svc.ListTables(context.TODO(), &dynamodb.ListTablesInput{
        Limit: aws.Int32(5),
    })
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatalf("failed to list tables, %v", err)
    }

    fmt.Println("Tables:")
    for _, tableName := range resp.TableNames {
        fmt.Println(tableName)
    }
}
```

TITLE: Configuring Adaptive Retry Mode in AWS SDK for Go v2
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet describes the introduction of the `Adaptive` retry mode for API clients. It enhances resilience by implementing client-side rate limiting in response to throttle responses received from AWS APIs. This feature enables dynamic adjustment of request rates based on server feedback, aiming to optimize throughput while avoiding overload.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/service/rds/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: go
CODE:
```
* **Feature**: Adds RetryMaxAttempts and RetryMod to API client Options. This allows the API clients' default Retryer to be configured from the shared configuration files or environment variables. Adding a new Retry mode of `Adaptive`. `Adaptive` retry mode is an experimental mode, adding client rate limiting when throttles reponses are received from an API. See [retry.AdaptiveMode](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws/retry#AdaptiveMode) for more details, and configuration options.
```

TITLE: Adding RetryMaxAttempts and RetryMod to API client Options in AWS SDK Go V2
DESCRIPTION: This feature introduces `RetryMaxAttempts` and `RetryMod` to the API client options of the AWS SDK for Go V2. This allows configuration of the API clients' default Retryer from shared configuration files or environment variables, and introduces an experimental Adaptive retry mode with client rate limiting when throttles are received. See [retry.AdaptiveMode](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws/retry#AdaptiveMode) for more details and configuration options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/service/fis/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-11_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Go

* **Feature**: API client updated
* **Feature**: Adds RetryMaxAttempts and RetryMod to API client Options. This allows the API clients' default Retryer to be configured from the shared configuration files or environment variables. Adding a new Retry mode of `Adaptive`. `Adaptive` retry mode is an experimental mode, adding client rate limiting when throttles reponses are received from an API. See [retry.AdaptiveMode](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws/retry#AdaptiveMode) for more details, and configuration options.
* **Feature**: Updated `github.com/aws/smithy-go` to latest version

```

LANGUAGE: None
CODE:
```

If header contains RestoreStatus as the value, then S3 will include Glacier restore status i.e. isRestoreInProgress and RestoreExpiryDate in List response.

TITLE: Handling Expires values in responses with AWS SDK for Go v2
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet relates to handling the `Expires` value in HTTP responses. When parsing the response header, the SDK will now return `nil` if it cannot parse the value set for this field. A new field, `ExpiresString`, has been added to retain the unparsed value from the response regardless of its format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/service/s3/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: None
CODE:
```
* **Bug Fix**: Prevent parsing failures for nonstandard `Expires` values in responses. If the SDK cannot parse the value set in the response header for this field it will now be returned as `nil`. A new field, `ExpiresString`, has been added that will retain the unparsed value from the response (regardless of whether it came back in a format recognized by the SDK).
```

TITLE: Endpoint Parameters Region handling in AWS SDK for Go v2
DESCRIPTION: When sourcing values for a service's `EndpointParameters`, the lack of a configured region will now translate to a `nil` value instead of a pointer to the empty string. This leads to more explicit errors when calling an operation. It prevents an obscure hostname lookup failure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/service/s3/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-11_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: None
CODE:
```
* **Bug Fix**: When sourcing values for a service's `EndpointParameters`, the lack of a configured region (i.e. `options.Region == ""`) will now translate to a `nil` value for `EndpointParameters.Region` instead of a pointer to the empty string `""`. This will result in a much more explicit error when calling an operation instead of an obscure hostname lookup failure.
```

TITLE: Configuring Retry Options in Go
DESCRIPTION: This snippet adds options to configure the API client's default Retryer, allowing it to be configured from shared configuration files or environment variables. It also introduces a new Adaptive retry mode with client rate limiting for throttle responses.  The adaptive retry mode is flagged as experimental.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/service/kinesisvideomedia/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-11_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Go
CODE:
```
"# v1.9.0 (2022-02-24)

* **Feature**: Adds RetryMaxAttempts and RetryMod to API client Options. This allows the API clients' default Retryer to be configured from the shared configuration files or environment variables. Adding a new Retry mode of `Adaptive`. `Adaptive` retry mode is an experimental mode, adding client rate limiting when throttles reponses are received from an API. See [retry.AdaptiveMode](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws/retry#AdaptiveMode) for more details, and configuration options."
```

# v1.4.2 (2024-03-07)

# v1.4.0 (2024-02-22)

* **Feature**: Add middleware stack snapshot tests.

# v1.3.2 (2024-02-21)

* **Dependency Update**: Updated to the latest SDK module versions

# v1.3.1 (2024-02-20)

* **Bug Fix**: When sourcing values for a service's `EndpointParameters`, the lack of a configured region (i.e. `options.Region == ""`) will now translate to a `nil` value for `EndpointParameters.Region` instead of a pointer to the empty string "". This will result in a much more explicit error when calling an operation instead of an obscure hostname lookup failure.

# v1.3.0 (2024-02-13)

* **Feature**: Bump minimum Go version to 1.20 per our language support policy.
* **Dependency Update**: Updated to the latest SDK module versions

# v1.2.1 (2024-01-04)

* **Dependency Update**: Updated to the latest SDK module versions

# v1.2.0 (2023-12-21)

* **Feature**: This release introduces Amazon Aurora as a vector store on Knowledge Bases for Amazon Bedrock

# v1.1.5 (2023-12-08)

* **Bug Fix**: Reinstate presence of default Retryer in functional options, but still respect max attempts set therein.

TITLE: Documenting Version Update in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the structure used to document a version update in the changelog. It includes the version number, date, and a list of changes made in that version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/blob/main/service/transfer/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# v1.16.0 (2022-02-24)

* **Feature**: API client updated
* **Feature**: Adds RetryMaxAttempts and RetryMod to API client Options. This allows the API clients' default Retryer to be configured from the shared configuration files or environment variables. Adding a new Retry mode of `Adaptive`. `Adaptive` retry mode is an experimental mode, adding client rate limiting when throttles reponses are received from an API. See [retry.AdaptiveMode](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws/retry#AdaptiveMode) for more details, and configuration options.
* **Feature**: Updated `github.com/aws/smithy-go` to latest version
* **Dependency Update**: Updated to the latest SDK module versions
```
